item.title: Solution to Leetcode - Happy Number
item.description: As part of 30 days challenge during the Corono pandemic, Leetcode published this problem on the second day: A happy number is a number defined by the following process: Starting with any positive integer, replace the number by the sum of the squares of its digits, and repeat the process until the number equals 1 (where it will stay), or it loops endlessly in a cycle which does not include 1.
